title: Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 436 of 2020) (as
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Irish Sign Language Act 2017
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Irish Sign Language Act 2017 

(Commencement) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited irish sign language act 2017 (commencement) order 2020

title: Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 436 of 2020) (as
heading: 2. The 23rd day of December 2020 is fixed as the day on which the Irish
text_raw:
2. The 23rd day of December 2020 is fixed as the day on which the Irish 

Sign Language Act 2017 (No. 40 of 2017) comes into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

17 December, 2020. 

RODERIC O’GORMAN, 

Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and 
Youth. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 5th January, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [658] 3
